hero.caption: Software engineer and a JavaScript enthusiast, I bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the world of web development. With a strong foundation in building web applications and a keen eye for design, I am dedicated to crafting exceptional digital experiences.

first.title: Web Developer at PR MEDIA
first.caption: As a passionate and driven web developer, I had the incredible opportunity to intern at PR MEDIA, a dynamic and innovative digital marketing company, for a duration of two enriching months. During this exciting period, I honed my skills in web development and gained valuable hands-on experience in creating engaging online experiences.

second.title: Full Stack Web Developer at ISMAELAND
second.caption: As a dedicated Full Stack Developer at Ismaeland, I have had the privilege of playing a pivotal role in the company's mission to deliver cutting-edge digital solutions and revolutionize the online experience. With my expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I have contributed to the creation of robust, user-friendly, and innovative web applications that have driven Ismaeland's success.

first.description: This is a web app that tracks covid-19 cases on a worldwide scale. Using ReactJs and css and MaterialUi library to build the interface and fetch data using a public api “disease.sh”.

second.description: A Digital Store built used ReactJs + Vite, TypeScript and UI library NextUi, Formik and yup for form validation AND firebase as a data storage

third.description: ProNerf is a NFT Store application, built using React Native with Expo

fourth.description: Well made store for all kinds of shoes, built using NextJs, Tailwind and Sanity CMS + firebase
